question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Abbot
solution:
Abbot

An Abbot is the male superior of a monastery of monks.

Hindi Meaning: मठ का श्रेष्ठ

Root Words: Lat. abbatem = father

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Aboriginal
solution:
Aboriginal

Aboriginal refers to people who existed in a region from the earliest times.

Hindi Meaning: किसी भूमि पर आरंभिक काल से या उपनिवेशवादियों के आगमन से पहले से विद्यमान

Root Words: Lat. ab origine = from the beginning

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Aborigines
solution:
Aborigines

Aborigines are the indigenous people of mainland Australia.

Hindi Meaning: किसी देश में आरंभिक काल से रहने वाले निवासी/उस देश के मूल निवासी/मूल निवासी

Root Words: Same as above

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Adonis
solution:
Adonis

Adonis is a figure from Greek mythology, symbolizing perfect male beauty.

Hindi Meaning: एक अत्यंत युवा व्यक्ति

Root Words: From Greek mythology – symbol of male beauty

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Agnostic
solution:
Agnostic

An Agnostic maintains that nothing is or can be known about the nature or existence of God.

Hindi Meaning: संशयवादी / अज्ञेयवादी

Root Words: Greek a- (without) + gnosis (knowledge)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Alien
solution:
Alien

An Alien is someone who is not a native of the place they are in, typically a foreigner or outsider.

Hindi Meaning: किसी विदेशी देश से संबंधित व्यक्ति /आप जिससे परिचित हैं उससे भिन्न /किसी अन्य दुनिया से आया हुआ काल्पनिक प्राणी

Root Words: Lat. alienus = foreign

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Altruist
solution:
Altruist

An Altruist is someone who prioritizes others' welfare over their own.

Hindi Meaning: परोपकारी व्यक्ति

Root Words: Latin alteri (others)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Amateur
option_3: A beginner who does something for pleasure
solution:
Amateur

An Amateur does something as a hobby or interest, not professionally or for payment.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो पेशे के बजाय आनंद के लिए खेलता है / ऐसा व्यक्ति जो न तो अधिक अनुभवी है और न ही पेशेवर है / ऐसा गैर-पेशेवर जो किसी विशेष गतिविधि में अयोग्य है

Root Words: Lat. amator = lover

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Amputee
solution:
Amputee

An Amputee is someone who has lost one or more limbs due to injury or medical reasons.

Hindi Meaning: ऐसा व्यक्ति जिसके एक या अधिक अंग निकाल दिए गए हों

Root Words: Lat. amputare = to cut off

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Apostate
solution:
Apostate

An Apostate is someone who forsakes their religion, cause, or party.

Hindi Meaning: धर्मत्यागी

Root Words: Greek apostates (defector)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Applicant
solution:
Applicant

An Applicant is someone who applies for a job, admission, or any formal request.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो औपचारिक रूप से किसी चीज़ का अनुरोध करता है, विशेष रूप से नौकरी का

Root Words: Lat. applicare = to attach

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Apprentice
solution:
Apprentice

An Apprentice works under a master to gain practical knowledge in a trade.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो किसी व्यापार को सीखने के लिए किसी विशेषज्ञ के लिए काम करता है

Root Words: Lat. apprehendere = to learn

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Atheist
option_3: One who denies the existence of God
solution:
Atheist

An Atheist denies or disbelieves the existence of any deity.

Hindi Meaning: नास्तिक

Root Words: Greek a- (without) + theos (god)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Bachelor
solution:
Bachelor

A Bachelor refers to a man who has never been married.

Hindi Meaning: एक आदमी जो अविवाहित रहता है

Root Words: Lat. baccalarius = young knight/farmhand

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Bigot
solution:
Bigot

A Bigot is someone who is strongly and unfairly prejudiced against differing views or beliefs.

Hindi Meaning: कट्टरपंथी / असहिष्णु व्यक्ति

Root Words: French bigot (hypocrite, religious zealot)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Boer
solution:
Boer

Boer refers to descendants of Dutch settlers in South Africa.

Hindi Meaning: दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी डच वंश का व्यक्ति

Root Words: Dutch for farmer

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Bookworm
solution:
Bookworm

A Bookworm is someone who loves reading and spends a lot of time doing it.

Hindi Meaning: एक शौकीन पुस्तक पाठक / जो बहुत पढ़ता है

Root Words: Compound: book + worm (metaphor for book lover)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Cacographer
solution:
Cacographer

Cacographer comes from “caco” (bad) and “graphy” (writing), meaning poor handwriting.

Hindi Meaning: जो वर्तनी में ख़राब है

Root Words: Gr. kakos = bad + graphein = to write

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Charlatan
solution:
Charlatan

A Charlatan deceives others by pretending to have skills or knowledge.

Hindi Meaning: कोई व्यक्ति विशेष ज्ञान या कौशल होने का झूठा दावा करता है

Root Words: It. ciarlare = to chatter

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Colleague
solution:
Colleague

A Colleague refers to someone who works in the same profession or organization.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जिसके साथ आप एक ही स्थान पर, किसी पेशे या व्यवसाय में काम करते हैं

Root Words: Lat. com- = together + legare = to choose

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Compatriots
solution:
Compatriots

Compatriots are fellow citizens or people from the same nation.

Hindi Meaning: जो लोग एक ही देश के हैं

Root Words: Lat. com- = with + patria = country

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Connoisseur
solution:
Connoisseur

A Connoisseur is someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially in arts or cuisine.

Hindi Meaning: पारखी / विशेषज्ञ

Root Words: French connaître (to know)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Dilettante
solution:
Dilettante

A Dilettante dabbles in the arts or other fields without serious intent or knowledge.

Hindi Meaning: कला और साहित्य में रुचि रखने वाला

Root Words: It. dilettare = to delight

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Emeritus
solution:
Emeritus

Emeritus is a title given to retired professors as an honor, often still engaged in some capacity.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जिसे सम्मानपूर्वक सेवा से मुक्त कर दिया गया हो

Root Words: Lat. emereri = to earn by service

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Emissary
solution:
Emissary

An Emissary is someone sent to represent a group or government.

Hindi Meaning: विशेष दूत

Root Words: Latin emittere (to send out)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Envoy
solution:
Envoy

An Envoy is often a diplomatic agent or messenger sent for negotiations.

Hindi Meaning: दूत / राजदूत

Root Words: French envoyer (to send)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Escort
solution:
Escort

An Escort ensures safe movement or companionship during travel or events.

Hindi Meaning: वह जो किसी की रक्षा के लिए उसके साथ जाता है

Root Words: Fr. escorte = convoy

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Fugitive
option_3: One who has escaped law or captivity
solution:
Fugitive

A Fugitive is someone fleeing from custody or danger.

Hindi Meaning: भगोड़ा

Root Words: Latin fugere (to flee)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Guardian
solution:
Guardian

A Guardian has the legal responsibility for someone, especially a minor.

Hindi Meaning: संरक्षक

Root Words: Old French guarder (to guard)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Heir
solution:
Heir

A Heir is a person legally entitled to the property or rank of another on that person's death.

Hindi Meaning: उत्तराधिकारी

Root Words: Latin heres (heir)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Heiress
solution:
Heiress

A Heiress is a woman who is legally entitled to inherit money, property, or a title.

Hindi Meaning: उत्तराधिकारी (स्त्री)

Root Words: Latin hereditare (to inherit)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Hermit
solution:
Hermit

A Hermit lives in solitude, often for religious reasons, away from society.

Hindi Meaning: तपस्वी / संन्यासी

Root Words: Greek eremos (desert)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Hostage
solution:
Hostage

A Hostage is a person seized or held as security for the fulfillment of a condition.

Hindi Meaning: बंधक

Root Words: Latin obses (one who is pledged)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Hostess
solution:
Hostess

A Hostess is a woman who receives or entertains guests.

Hindi Meaning: एक महिला जो मेहमानों का मनोरंजन करती है

Root Words: Lat. hospes = guest

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Interloper
solution:
Interloper

An Interloper is someone who interferes in the affairs of others without permission.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो दूसरों के मामलों में हस्तक्षेप करता है, अक्सर स्वार्थी कारणों से

Root Words: inter + loop = one who intrudes

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Jockey
solution:
Jockey

A Jockey is a professional rider in horse races.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो घुड़दौड़ में भाग लेता है, विशेष रूप से पेशे के रूप में

Root Words: origin from sport, jockey = rider

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Maiden
solution:
Maiden

A Maiden is a girl or young woman, especially one who is not married.

Hindi Meaning: एक लड़की या युवा महिला, विशेष रूप से अविवाहित

Root Words: OE mægden = young woman

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Martyr
solution:
Martyr

A Martyr is someone who is killed because of their religious or other beliefs.

Hindi Meaning: बलिदानी / शहीद

Root Words: Greek martus (witness)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Matriarch
solution:
Matriarch

A Matriarch is a woman who is the head and often founder of a family or tribe.

Hindi Meaning: महिला जो परिवार की मुखिया है

Root Words: Lat. mater = mother + arch = ruler

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Mercenary
solution:
Mercenary

A Mercenary is a professional soldier hired to serve in a foreign army, motivated by personal gain.

Hindi Meaning: पैसा लेकर लड़ने वाला सैनिक

Root Words: Latin mercenarius (hired)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Nomad
solution:
Nomad

A Nomad is someone who does not settle permanently in one place.

Hindi Meaning: घुमंतु / खानाबदोश

Root Words: Greek nomas (roaming for pasture)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Novice
solution:
Novice

A Novice is a person new to and inexperienced in a job or situation.

Hindi Meaning: नवदीक्षित / नया सदस्य

Root Words: Latin novus (new)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Orphan
solution:
Orphan

An Orphan is a child whose parents have died.

Hindi Meaning: अनाथ

Root Words: Greek orphanos (bereaved)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Patriot
solution:
Patriot

A Patriot is someone who loves, supports, and defends his or her country.

Hindi Meaning: देशभक्त

Root Words: Latin patria (fatherland)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Pilgrim
solution:
Pilgrim

A Pilgrim is a person who travels to a sacred place for religious devotion.

Hindi Meaning: तीर्थयात्री

Root Words: Latin peregrinus (foreigner/traveler)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Pioneer
solution:
Pioneer

A Pioneer is someone who is one of the first to settle in a territory or develop a new idea.

Hindi Meaning: वह जो पहली बार कुछ करता है

Root Words: Fr. pionnier = foot soldier → first explorer

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Polygamist
solution:
Polygamist

A Polygamist practices or supports having more than one wife or husband at the same time.

Hindi Meaning: एक व्यक्ति जो एक ही समय में एक से अधिक पत्नियाँ रखता हो

Root Words: Gr. poly = many + gamos = marriage

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Prodigy
solution:
Prodigy

A Prodigy is a young person who has exceptional qualities or abilities.

Hindi Meaning: विलक्षण प्रतिभा वाला बालक

Root Words: Latin prodigium (omen, monster)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Recluse
solution:
Recluse

A Recluse lives a solitary life and tends to avoid other people.

Hindi Meaning: एकांतवासी

Root Words: Latin recludere (shut up)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Renegade
solution:
Renegade

A Renegade is someone who abandons a cause or group and joins the opposing side.

Hindi Meaning: धर्मत्यागी / विश्वासघाती

Root Words: Latin renegare (deny)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Samaritan
solution:
Samaritan

A Samaritan helps others in distress, inspired by the biblical parable of the Good Samaritan.

Hindi Meaning: परोपकारी व्यक्ति

Root Words: From biblical story of the Good Samaritan

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Spinster
solution:
Spinster

A Spinster is a woman who has never married (archaic or humorous usage).

Hindi Meaning: एक बूढ़ी अविवाहित महिला

Root Words: OE spinnan = to spin (unmarried women spun wool)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Stoic
solution:
Stoic

A Stoic endures hardship without showing feelings or complaining.

Hindi Meaning: कष्ट में भी शांत रहने वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: Greek Stoa (porch where philosophers met)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Swashbuckler
solution:
Swashbuckler

A Swashbuckler is a heroic or daring person known for bravery and bold actions, often in fiction.

Hindi Meaning: डींगमार

Root Words: Swash = strike + buckler = small shield

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Traitor
solution:
Traitor

A Traitor is someone who betrays trust, loyalty, or allegiance.

Hindi Meaning: देशद्रोही / गद्दार

Root Words: Latin tradere (to hand over)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Usher
solution:
Usher

An Usher is a person who guides people to their seats, especially in a theatre or at a wedding.

Hindi Meaning: एक व्यक्ति जो लोगों को उनकी सीटें दिखाता है

Root Words: ME ussher = doorkeeper

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Vagabond
solution:
Vagabond

A Vagabond is someone who moves from place to place without a permanent home or job.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो बिना घर या नौकरी के एक स्थान से दूसरे स्थान पर भटकता रहता है

Root Words: Lat. vagari = to wander

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Vagrant
solution:
Vagrant

A Vagrant is a person without a settled home or regular work who wanders from place to place.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जिसके पास कोई स्थायी घर या नियमित काम नहीं है, जो एक स्थान से दूसरे स्थान पर भटकता रहता है और भीख मांगकर जीवनयापन करता है

Root Words: Lat. vagrans = roaming

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Ventriloquist
solution:
Ventriloquist

A Ventriloquist speaks in such a way that the sound seems to come from elsewhere, often a puppet.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जिसके पास इस तरह बोलने की कला हो कि ध्वनि किसी अन्य व्यक्ति/स्थान से आती प्रतीत हो

Root Words: Lat. venter = belly + loqui = to speak

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Wag
solution:
Wag

A Wag is someone known for making humorous remarks or jokes.

Hindi Meaning: एक मज़ाकिया व्यक्ति जो मनोरंजक किस्सों से भरा हुआ है

Root Words: Slang: witty person, OE wagian = to shake

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Widow
solution:
Widow

A Widow is a woman who has lost her spouse by death and has not remarried.

Hindi Meaning: वह महिला जिसका पति मर चुका है, विशेषकर वह जिसने दोबारा विवाह नहीं किया है

Root Words: Lat. vidua = bereaved

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Widower
solution:
Widower

A Widower is a man whose spouse has died and who has not remarried.

Hindi Meaning: एक आदमी जिसकी पत्नी मर चुकी है

Root Words: Male form of widow
